Articles.Content:
Glory in the highest to those wonderful beige-pink skinned spacefarers! The originals, the builders! They RETURN!

:hailhuman:
Humanity? More like Hu*manitee*, amirite folks?

:hailhuman:

Probes are lame. Humans are badasses.

:hailmosquito: Mosquitoes are responsible for more human deaths than human murderers and steal our blood. Hail our overlords!

At the same time :hailallhumans:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T03:31:02Z" title="08/01/2015 03:31  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**
What are humans? Never heard of them...

:hailhuman:

Glory to the Progenitors! We owe to them the creation of pretty much everything that's cool!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T19:15:47Z" title="08/01/2015 07:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by Souper**

:hailhuman:

They were the first ones to explore the Mariana Trench!
